text:
I’m sensing a pattern here. :frowning_face: 
Philip Elder MCTS 
Senior Technical Architect 
Microsoft High Availability MVP
 
E-mail:

instantly at all hours of the day, our regular business hours are 8:00 AM - 5:00
PM, Monday thru Friday.

metadata.topic: Ars Technica: Microsoft network breached through password-spraying by Russian-state hackers
metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] Ars Technica: Microsoft network breached through password-spraying by Russian-state hackers
